reporter_caption.center: STATE v. AMES BIG N DEPARTMENT STORE, 141 Vt. 656 (1982)

caption.center: STATE of Vermont v. AMES BIG N DEPARTMENT STORE

opinion.posture: Appeal from District Court, Unit No. 6, Windsor Circuit.
opinion.opinion_text: This case being controlled by our decision in State v.Ludlow Supermarkets, Inc., 141 Vt. 261, 448 A.2d 791, filed this same date, the judgment below granting the defendant's motion to dismiss the prosecution is affirmed.
